mapper.select: SELECT auth_account_expiry_history_id, auth_account_id, event_type, reason, occurred_at, operated_by, created_at, created_by FROM AUTH_ACCOUNT_EXPIRY_HISTORY WHERE auth_account_id = #{authAccountId} ORDER BY occurred_at DESC, auth_account_expiry_history_id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO AUTH_ACCOUNT_EXPIRY_HISTORY ( auth_account_id, event_type, reason, occurred_at, operated_by, created_by ) VALUES ( #{authAccountId}, #{eventType}, #{reason}, #{occurredAt}, #{operatedBy}, #{createdBy} )
